Class ColorChooserGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ColorChooserGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class ColorChooserGUI
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class controls the main components of the gui by extension of a JPanel so we can draw a rectangle.
    Author:
    Dean Farwell
    See Also:
    JPanel, Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private class  ColorChooserGUI.ActionHandler
      Class that implements ActionListener to look for entries in the text box, it will then update the slider and color values of the rectangle.
      private class  ColorChooserGUI.ChangeHandler
      Class that implements ChangeListener to look for updates to the slider, it will then update the text box and color values of the rectangle.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javax.swing.JPanel
